name: major
caption: Major ordering cost
message: Major ordering cost must be positive

name: procedure
caption: Heuristic procedure
default_value: Silver|Management Science, 1976;Goyal|Management Science, 1973;Hariga|Journal of Operational Research Society, 1994;Jackson|Mucsktadt and Maxwell (IIE Transactions, 1985)
message: Select a Heuristic procedure from the list

name: dd
caption: Demand rate
message: Demand rate must be strictly positive. Use the same time unit as the production rate.

name: order
caption: Ordering cost
message: Setup/Ordering cost must be strictly positive.

name: hh
caption: Holding cost
message: Holding cost rate must be expressed as a percentage.

name: pipi
caption: Backorder cost
message: Leave the default value in case backorders are disallowed
